API Reference

Data Models

NodeType Enumeration

Defines the types of document structure elements:

NodeType Enumeration Definition
 1class NodeType(str, Enum):
 2    SECTION = "section"
 3    PARAGRAPH = "paragraph"
 4    CODE_BLOCK = "code_block"
 5    MATH_BLOCK = "math_block"
 6    TABLE = "table"
 7    FIGURE = "figure"
 8    ADMONITION = "admonition"
 9    LIST = "list"
10    LIST_ITEM = "list_item"

DocumentNode Model

Represents a single element in the document structure:

DocumentNode Model
 1class DocumentNode(BaseModel):
 2    id: str                      # Unique ID (hash-based)
 3    type: NodeType               # Element type
 4    content: str                 # Text content
 5    level: Optional[int]         # Section hierarchy level
 6    title: Optional[str]         # Section title
 7    label: Optional[str]         # Reference label
 8    name: Optional[str]          # :name: attribute
 9    caption: Optional[str]       # :caption: attribute
10    language: Optional[str]      # Code block language
11    parent_id: Optional[str]     # Parent node reference
12    children_ids: List[str]      # Child node references
13    file_path: Path              # Source file path
14    line_number: int             # Line number in source
15    metadata: Dict[str, Any]     # Additional metadata

TranslationUnit Model

Manages translation data for document elements:

TranslationUnit Model
1class TranslationUnit(BaseModel):
2    node_id: str                           # Reference to DocumentNode
3    source_lang: str                       # Source language code
4    target_lang: str                       # Target language code
5    source_content: str                    # Original content
6    translated_content: Optional[str]      # Translated content
7    status: TranslationStatus              # Translation status
8    content_hash: str                      # Content hash for change detection
9    translation_date: Optional[datetime]   # Last translation timestamp

TranslationStatus Enumeration

Tracks the state of translations:

TranslationStatus Enumeration
1class TranslationStatus(str, Enum):
2    PENDING = "pending"        # Not yet translated
3    TRANSLATED = "translated"  # Translation complete
4    REVIEWED = "reviewed"      # Translation reviewed
5    OUTDATED = "outdated"      # Source content changed

Database Schema

Nodes Table

Stores document structural elements:

Nodes Table Schema
 1CREATE TABLE nodes (
 2    id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
 3    type TEXT NOT NULL,
 4    content TEXT NOT NULL,
 5    level INTEGER,
 6    title TEXT,
 7    label TEXT,
 8    name TEXT,
 9    caption TEXT,
10    language TEXT,
11    parent_id TEXT,
12    children_ids TEXT,
13    file_path TEXT NOT NULL,
14    line_number INTEGER NOT NULL,
15    content_hash TEXT NOT NULL,
16    metadata JSON,
17    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
18    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
19    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES nodes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
20);

Indexes:

  • label and name: Fast reference resolution

  • parent_id: Efficient hierarchy traversal

  • file_path: File-based operations

  • content_hash: Change detection

References Table

Maintains cross-reference relationships:

References Table Schema
1CREATE TABLE references (
2    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
3    source_node_id TEXT NOT NULL,
4    target_label TEXT NOT NULL,
5    ref_type TEXT NOT NULL,
6    resolved_target_id TEXT,
7    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
8    FOREIGN KEY (source_node_id) REFERENCES nodes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
9);

Fields:

  • source_node_id: Node containing the reference

  • target_label: Label being referenced

  • ref_type: Type of reference (e.g., ‘ref’, ‘doc’, ‘numref’)

  • resolved_target_id: Resolved target node ID (if found)

Translation Units Table

Tracks translation status and content:

Translation Units Table Schema
 1CREATE TABLE translation_units (
 2    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
 3    node_id TEXT NOT NULL,
 4    source_lang TEXT NOT NULL,
 5    target_lang TEXT NOT NULL,
 6    source_content TEXT NOT NULL,
 7    translated_content TEXT,
 8    status TEXT DEFAULT 'pending',
 9    content_hash TEXT NOT NULL,
10    translation_date TIMESTAMP,
11    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
12    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
13    FOREIGN KEY (node_id) REFERENCES nodes(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
14    UNIQUE(node_id, source_lang, target_lang)
15);

Indexes:

  • status: Filter by translation state

  • (node_id, source_lang, target_lang): Unique constraint for language pairs

Core Interfaces

DocumentParser (Abstract Base Class)

Base interface for all document parsers:

DocumentParser Interface
 1class DocumentParser(ABC):
 2    @abstractmethod
 3    def parse(self, file_path: Path) -> List[DocumentNode]:
 4        """Parse a document file and return structured nodes."""
 5        pass
 6    
 7    @abstractmethod
 8    def extract_references(self, nodes: List[DocumentNode]) -> List[Reference]:
 9        """Extract cross-references from document nodes."""
10        pass

StructureDB

Database management interface:

StructureDB Interface
 1class StructureDB:
 2    def __init__(self, db_path: Path):
 3        """Initialize database connection."""
 4        
 5    def insert_node(self, node: DocumentNode) -> None:
 6        """Insert a document node."""
 7        
 8    def get_node(self, node_id: str) -> Optional[DocumentNode]:
 9        """Retrieve a node by ID."""
10        
11    def update_translation(self, unit: TranslationUnit) -> None:
12        """Update translation unit status."""
13        
14    def get_pending_translations(self, lang_pair: Tuple[str, str]) -> List[TranslationUnit]:
15        """Get all pending translations for a language pair."""

ProjectAnalyzer

Sphinx project analysis interface:

ProjectAnalyzer Interface
 1class ProjectAnalyzer:
 2    def __init__(self, project_dir: Path):
 3        """Initialize with project directory."""
 4        
 5    def load_config(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
 6        """Load Sphinx configuration from conf.py."""
 7        
 8    def analyze_project(self) -> ProjectStructure:
 9        """Analyze entire project structure."""
10        
11    def get_toctree(self) -> TocTree:
12        """Extract table of contents structure."""

Usage Examples

Parsing a Document

Document Parsing Example
1from docdiff.parsers import MySTParser
2from pathlib import Path
3
4parser = MySTParser()
5nodes = parser.parse(Path("docs/index.md"))
6
7for node in nodes:
8    print(f"{node.type}: {node.title or node.content[:50]}")

Managing Translations

Translation Management Example
 1from docdiff.database import StructureDB
 2from docdiff.models import TranslationStatus
 3
 4db = StructureDB(Path(".docdiff/structure.db"))
 5
 6# Get pending translations
 7pending = db.get_pending_translations(("en", "ja"))
 8
 9# Update translation status
10for unit in pending:
11    unit.translated_content = translate(unit.source_content)
12    unit.status = TranslationStatus.TRANSLATED
13    db.update_translation(unit)

Analyzing a Project

Project Analysis Example
1from docdiff.analyzer import ProjectAnalyzer
2
3analyzer = ProjectAnalyzer(Path("docs/"))
4structure = analyzer.analyze_project()
5
6print(f"Found {len(structure.files)} documentation files")
7print(f"Total nodes: {structure.total_nodes}")
